project-rule.name: ant
project-rule.description: Assumes jars start with 'ant' and uses md5 digests to find versions gte 1.1 and lte 1.7

project-rule.name: axis
project-rule.description: Assumes jars start with 'axis' (not 'axis2') and uses md5 digests to find version 1.4 only.

project-rule.name: axis2
project-rule.description: Finds versions based on the fact that all standard distributions start with 'axis2' and contain the version in the filename.

project-rule.name: bash
project-rule.description: Scans bash binary files for version string information

project-rule.name: bash
project-rule.description: Scans bash binary files for version string information

project-rule.name: commons-proxy
project-rule.description: Finds versions if a version string is embedded in the filename.

project-rule.name: cvs
project-rule.description: Looks for files named 'cvs' or 'cvs.exe' and attempts to regex match the binary content of the file for version info.

project-rule.name: jboss
project-rule.description: Uses md5 digests to find versions gte 3.0.5 and lte 5.0.0.Beta2

project-rule.name: jstl
project-rule.description: Finds jakarta's implementation of jstl, assuming jars that start with 'jstl' and using md5 digests to find versions gte 1.0 and lte 1.1.2

project-rule.name: log4j
project-rule.description: Pulls versions out of filenames and performs md5 checks for versions.

project-rule.name: mcube
project-rule.description: Project designed to solve 4x4x4 Rubiks Cubes. Simply looks for filenames.

result.expression: libversion OR binversion OR modversion OR exeversion OR dllthreadedversion OR dllversion

project-rule.name: poi
project-rule.description: Assumes jars start with 'poi' and uses md5 digests to find versions gte 1.8.0-dev-20020919 and lte 3.0.1-FINAL-20070705

project-rule.name: struts
project-rule.description: Assumes jars start with 'struts' (not 'struts2') and uses md5 digests to find versions gte 1.0.2 and lte 1.2.9

project-rule.name: struts2
project-rule.description: Finds versions based on the fact that all standard distributions start with 'struts2' and contain the version in the filename.

project-rule.name: xalan
project-rule.description: Assumes jars that start with 'xalan' or 'xsltc' and uses md5 digests to find versions gte 1.0.0 and lte 2.7.0

project-rule.name: xerces
project-rule.description: Assumes jars that start with 'xerces' and uses md5 digests to find versions gte 1.0.0 and lte 2.9.0
